actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United Sates Code, to make level IV of the executive schedule applicable to the U.S. attorney for the Central District of California and to the U.S. attorney for the Northern District of Illinois.

summary.text: Makes level IV of the Executive Schedule applicable to the United States attorney for the central district of California and to the United States attorney for the northern district of Illinois. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 5315)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United Sates Code, to make level IV of the executive schedule applicable to the U.S. attorney for the Central District of California and to the U.S. attorney for the Northern District of Illinois.
